Previous Season Next Season

Super Bowl Champion: Philadelphia Eagles

AP MVP: Josh Allen

AP Offensive Rookie of the Year: Jayden Daniels

AP Defensive Rookie of the Year: Jared Verse

AP Offensive Player of the Year: Saquon Barkley

AP Defensive Player of the Year: Patrick Surtain

Passing Leader: Joe Burrow, 4918 Yds

Rushing Leader: Saquon Barkley, 2005 Yds

Receiving Leader: Ja'Marr Chase, 1708 Yds
